link_desc:
Templates to monitor Buffalo TeraStations over SNMP v2c or v3.

Included monitors:

Disks

  • Status
  • Capacity
  • Used
  • S.M.A.R.T. Status
  • S.M.A.R.T. Current Pending Sector Count
  • S.M.A.R.T. Offline Uncorrectable Sector Count
  • S.M.A.R.T. Reallocated Sector Count

Arrays

  • Status
  • Capacity
  • Used

Logical Volumes

  • Name
  • Capacity
  • Used

iSCSI Volumes

  • Name
  • Status

System Information

  • Product Name
  • System Uptime
  • Serial Number
  • Firmware Version (Major)
  • Firmware Version (Minor)
  • Update Available
  • 1 Minute CPU Load Average
  • Total Memory
  • Available Memory
  • Percent Available Memory
  • Errors
  • Info/Warnings
  • Failover Status
  • Failover Role
  • Failover Partner
  • Redundant Power Supply Unit (RPSU) Status
